news.title: GM's record stock performance beats Tesla, Ford and other automakers in 2025
news.summary: General Motors' stock is having its best year since the company's reemergence from bankruptcy in 2009. The company's stock is up more than 20% this year.

news.title: Silver tops $80 for first time, then stages dramatic reversal overnight
news.summary: Silver slid more than 3% on Monday, after topping $80 for the first time ever in overnight trading. Silver was down more than 2% on Tuesday morning.

news.title: Zelenskyy asks Trump for 50 years of security guarantees, says meeting with Russia possible
news.summary: Ukraine's president says he has asked for security guarantees for up to 50 years for Ukraine. Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he had asked for guarantees for security for Ukraine for 50 years.

news.title: DigitalBridge shares jump as much as 50% after report SoftBank is in talks to acquire data center firm
news.summary: The premarket move comes shortly after Bloomberg reported Japan's SoftBank was in advanced talks to acquire the data center investment firm. The deal is expected to close in the next few weeks.

news.title: Your past-due student loans can make it harder to rent an apartment. These 5 tips can help
news.summary: If you've fallen behind on your student loans, it may be more challenging to get a property manager to approve you for rental housing, financial experts say.

news.title: ‘I completely trust her’: Should I name my daughter as beneficiary on all my accounts — or add her name instead?
news.summary: “She is an intelligent and responsible individual,” she says. “She’s not a bad person.” “I’m very proud of her,’ she adds.

news.title: Google rose to the top in the AI race. Here’s what it’ll take to stay there.
news.summary: Alphabet took the title as this year’s top-performing ‘Magnificent Seven’ stock, but the AI competition is fierce.

news.title: Here are the ideas that could really help solve America’s affordability crisis in 2026
news.summary: These 10 ideas targeting affordability will be tested in 2026. A look at the ones that could help most, including Trump accounts, free child care and tariff checks.

news.title: Here’s where AMD can gain ground in the AI chip race next year
news.summary: Wall Street will be watching to see if the chip maker’s upcoming AI accelerators and first rack-scale offering will bring it closer in competition with Nvidia.

news.title: The hot AI trade faces a 1980s style trap and these risks, says this market bull
news.summary: Evercore’s Emanuel: Expect more volatility for stocks next year. Emanuel: “I think we’re going to see a lot of volatility in the market.”
